channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group on SoftLayer API

item.title: getGraphImage
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group::getGraphImage Get the connection or status graph image for a load balancer service group. Overview Get the graph image for a load balancer service group based on the supplied graph type and metric. The only available graph type currently is: ‘connections’, and the available metrics are: ‘day’, ‘week’ and ‘month’. This method returns the raw binary image data. Parameters Name Type Description graphType string The graph type can currently only be ‘connections’.
